Interface PrinterManager


  • public interface PrinterManager

      Returns the current settings for the default printer

    • Method Detail

      • isPrinterServiceAvailable

        boolean isPrinterServiceAvailable()
        Returns:
        True if the printing service is installed and available

      • print

        io.reactivex.Observable<PrintJob> print(PrintPayload printPayload)
        Send a payload for printing
        Parameters:
        printPayload - The payload to print
        Returns:
        An observable stream of PrintJob which indicates the status of the printout

      • sendAction

        void sendAction(java.lang.String printerId,
                java.lang.String action)
        Send an action to a printer
        Parameters:
        printerId - The id of the printer to send the action to
        action - The action to perform (see for a list of commands the printer supports

      • status

        io.reactivex.Observable<PrinterStatus> status(java.lang.String printerId)
        A stream of PrinterStatus indicating the current state of the printer
        Parameters:
        printerId - The printerId to listen to
        Returns:
        An observable stream of PrinterStatus

      • getDefaultPrinterSettings

        io.reactivex.Single<PrinterSettings> getDefaultPrinterSettings()
        Returns the current settings for the default printer
        Returns:
        A Single which will emit the default printer settings if available

      • getPrintersSettings

        io.reactivex.Observable<PrinterSettingsList> getPrintersSettings()
        Returns an observable stream which will emit settings for all the available printers
        Returns:
        An observable stream containing a list of PrinterSettings objects contained in a PrinterSettingsList object
